name: Ofertas de Email
tag_list: discounts, offers, coupon, coupon-codes, promo-codes, discount-codes, online-shopping, e-commerce, brazil, ecommerce
description: discounts, coupon codes and best offers
overview:
We created the site www.ofertasdeemail.com.br. It is a unique and innovative idea, we do not have any competitor anywhere else in the world.

Here are some details of our business:

The first and only aggregator of email offers from Brazil and the World.

Aggregate into a single website the email offers that daily clog the inbox of your email?

This idea has become a reality at www.ofertasdeemail.com.br website where you can find the biggest discounts offered by major internet stores.

When he realized that the best offers are the ones that companies send by email, we decided to create this project, unique in the country and world.

We are a platform to boost sales in E-commerce / Discount Commerce.

Our desire is:

Making a difference in the world through small daily actions. And through the implementation of our ideas be present on the day-to-day life of every person. Having a dream and make it reality, knowing where you want to go is very pleasing, not to forget the people who stood by our side for this achievement.

In the Press:

Portal IG: http://startups.ig.com.br/2012/jovens-mato-grosso-do-sul-agregador-ofertas-email/

E-commerce News: http://ecommercenews.com.br/noticias/lancamentos/cansou-de-receber-e-mails-em-excesso-seus-problemas-acabaram
